bio: Stress-Handling like a dog: If you can't eat it or play with it, just pee on it - and walk away! Johann-Wolfgang-Goethe Universitt, Frankfurt Japanologie Fachhochschule Frankfurt Sozialpdagogik Krav Maga Center Frankfurt/Rhein-Main Lead Instructor Main-Echo, Aschaffenburg Online-Redakteur Frankfurter Rundschau, Germany Online-/Multimedia-Journalist
